Entries.Resort_Pier: Mmm. You know, I could retire here...
Entries.fall_15{{YearRemainder}}: Pierre has been working on his grange display for weeks. Let's see how we fare against you tomorrow!$h
Entries.winter_28{{YearRemainder}}: You ready for a new year, @? What are you planning on achieving?

Entries.24{{YearRemainder}}: Now that Joja's gone, I hope Pierre'll be able to relax a bit more. All this stress isn't good for him.
Entries.winter_26{{YearRemainder}}: Oh, I must have had too much eggnog yesterday.$s
Entries.summer_20{{YearRemainder}}: @, I've been thinking of growing more flowers in my greenhouse. What should I grow?

Entries.Resort_Entering: Ah, a nice day of rest and relaxation!$h
Entries.Resort_Bar_2: I could do with a Long Island Iced Tea right about now
Entries.spring_12{{YearRemainder}}: Abby's been training so hard for the egg hunt, I rarely see her train harder.
Entries.spring_23{{YearRemainder}}: Oh, @, it's the flower dance tomorrow! Will you be dancing?#$e#Personally, I greatly enjoyed it when I was young. I had few opportunities to put on a pretty dress.#$e#It's not really Abby's thing, though.
Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: My parents used to raise horses here when I was young.#$e#No lack of land around here!
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: I do miss riding horses. I had a lot more time for stuff like that when I was young.#$b#Also, horses can be quite expensive to maintain.
Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: Gosh, @, I was up way too late last night trying to balance the books.#$b#Apologies if I don't feel like chatting.
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Think I might order some new tea...Let's see, what have I not had recently?
Entries.13{{YearRemainder}}: Wonder if any of our suppliers is carrying a new tea?
Entries.15{{YearRemainder}}: Wish I had more time to garden, but running a small business is a lot of work.
Entries.19{{YearRemainder}}: Did you see the {{i18n:clothing.brand.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08}} }} dress Haley was wearing?#$b#I would never when I was her age!
Entries.25{{YearRemainder}}: %Caroline is muttering to herself.#$b#I wonder if we should get Abigail some therapy or something...#$e#What? Oh, it's nothing.
Entries.28{{YearRemainder}}: I grew up here in this valley. Only really left once, to go to college in Zuzu City.#$b#I love it here. It's my home.
Entries.Resort_Approach: @, I'm gonna go catch some sun over at Ginger Island today.$h

Entries.summer_Mon6: @, while I grew up here, I wasn't ever planning on moving back. That was Pierre's idea.#$b#I'm glad we did, though.
Entries.fall_Mon6: Think I'll take a walk around. Maybe head out to the woods.
Entries.winter_Mon6: There's nothing like fresh tea from a plant you've grown yourself.
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: Hey, @, how have you been? Join me for a cup of tea?[614]
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Ugh, @, I wish I had more time to garden.$s#$e#Say, take these and plant them for me? I haven't the time to do much gardening myself lately.[770]
Entries.17{{YearRemainder}}: Ever since Pierre decided that the shop should be open seven days a week, I've felt like I've always been at work.$s#$b#Wish I could just get a little time to drink a nice cup of tea.
Entries.21{{YearRemainder}}: Used to enjoy going out to the forest to gather mushrooms. We would sometimes sell them, helped when we needed the money.
Entries.23{{YearRemainder}}: Lewis handles most of the good export out of this county, and we're now handling most of the imports.$h
Entries.27{{YearRemainder}}: I wonder if I can convince Pierre to take me to {{Restaurant}}. I hear their {{Dish}} is to die for.

Entries.summer_Sun6: Thinking about taking a walk around, see if I can scare up some morels.#$b#Nothing like freshly foraged mushrooms. Well, if you're sure they're safe to eat.
Entries.Mon4: I love helping Evelyn out with the town gardens.$h
Entries.winter_Mon4: Gotta help Evelyn prepare the flower garden for next year, it'll be glorious!$h
Entries.spring_12_2: It'll be the egg hunt tomorrow! I wonder what interesting egg dishes Gus will put together this year?
Entries.Resort_Bar_2: Mmmmmm. I wonder what's in this?$h
Entries.1_2: @, I feel so old and out of touch these days. I have no clue what the young people want anymore.
Entries.3_2: We would have supported Abigail if she wanted to  leave home to go to college, but that wasn't what she wanted to do.
Entries.7_2: I can't believe how much has changed since I was young...#$e#When I was Abby's age, we'd go hitchhike all the time. Wasn't the wisest idea, in hindsight...$s
Entries.9_2: When I was young, my mother would raise horses in this valley.#$b#She taught me how to ride when I was just six years old.
Entries.11_2: Economically, the town seems to be doing better now.#$b#A lot of people had to move away during the last recession.$s#$e#Land's cheap out here, but it's hard to find a job, and everything is so much more expensive.#$b#To be honest, I'm not sure what Abigail will do.
Entries.13_2: I should see if Evelyn needs more help with those gardens, I do love working on them with her.$h
Entries.19_2: Abby has a test she's cramming for, so I'm trying to find some of her favorite snacks.
Entries.20_2: Jodi's always been a much better cook than I could ever be.
Entries.28_2: @, what else do you think we should carry?

Changes.LogName: Caroline: mid hearts Y2 post SO

Entries.5_2: I miss being young and free-spirited.$s#$b#And here I am, trying to get Abigail to behave more like an adult.$s
Entries.6_2: @! I got a little extra fertilizer. Would you like some?[368]$h
Entries.13_2: Gosh, I wish I wasn't so busy all the time running the shop.#$b#Would love to go vacation more often.
Entries.15_2: @, come enjoy a cup of tea with me![614]$h
Entries.17_2: Jodi gave me a recipe for {{Dish}}! She says it's great.
Entries.18_2: Argh, I'm not sure I want to spend the energy trying to convince Abby to do the dishes tonight.#$b#Frankly, @, it's sometimes easier to just do them myself.
Entries.Resort_2: Heya, @, what're you up to today? Planning to take a nice day off?
Entries.Resort_Bar_3: Oh, hey, @! How's the sun and shore treating you?#$b#*hic* I'm really enjoying this place!$h
Entries.Resort_Approach: @, I'm so excited to be going on vacation today!

Entries.winter_Mon8: The winter's been horrid this year. Maybe I should check in on George and Evelyn?
Entries.1_2: Inflation's been pretty bad this year, everything's getting more expensive.#$b#Most of our suppliers have raised their prices. And fuel's gone up by a lot.
Entries.3_2: I remember growing up in this valley. Pelican Town was bigger back then, we had three separate restaurants!#$b#It's shrunk over time after the mines closed and economic opportunities left.#$e#But with your farm here, and Leah and Elliott, maybe the town's growing again?#$b#Maybe we'll get another restaurant!
Entries.11_2: Maybe Abby would be more interested in music as a major? She does love playing her flute...
Entries.12_2: We could consider trying to get Abby enrolled in a conservatory. Being a musician is hard work, but if it's what she loves...
Entries.13_2: I wish I could get Pierre to join us for aerobics club sometimes. But he always says he's too busy.#$b#Think some exercise would do him good...
Entries.14_2: Some days I wish we could have a cat or a dog, but Pierre's allergic.#$e#I grew up with cats around, you know. You gotta have them out here, they take care of the mice.
Entries.15_2: Sometimes we do sell some of the produce I produce in my garden, but usually we just eat that.
Entries.16_2: Pierre's the type of guy who wants steak and potatoes on the dinner table every evening. That can't be good for his blood pressure.$s
Entries.17_2: Picked some beans yesterday for dinner. Nothing's really like fresh veggies you grew yourself, right?
Entries.18_2: Ugh, keeping this place clean is so much work, it's so big.$s
Entries.Resort_Bar_2: I wonder if Gus'll sell a boozy iced tea if I asked about it?$h

Entries.5_2: @, I made some bruschetta the other day. Do you want to try some?[618]

Entries.7_2: Was talking to Robin the other day.#$b#You know, @, we'd try our best to support Abigail if she wanted to move out. I'm not sure she wants to, though.
Entries.9_2: I asked Abby last night if she'd be happier living in the city.#$b#I'd miss her if she moved out, of course, but maybe it's necessary.$s

Entries.1_2: Sometimes, I feel like we're pushing Abby to grow up too quickly.#$b#I had her when I was fairly young. That type of responsibility really makes you grow up fast.
Entries.3_2: I was a pretty decent pianist when I was young. Nothing like Abigail's talent, of course.
Entries.4_2: Pierre actually has a quite decent singing voice, although he doesn't like performing for other people.
Entries.5_2: That weird band Pierre likes so much is going to be playing in Grampleton next Friday. Maybe I should get him some tickets...#$b#Not sure that fits in the budget though.
Entries.6_2: Pierre gets up at five in the morning to make sure the store is in good shape.
Entries.7_2: Ugh, @, if we had the money for it, I'd love to buy a robot to clean for us.$s
